alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:10PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones, central Onslow and southeastern Duplin Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Catherine Lake, or near New River Station, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New River Station, Half Moon, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, Camp Lejeune Center, Swansboro, Hubert, Silverdale, Kellum, Midway Park, Verona, Catherine Lake, Belgrade, Richlands South, Deppe, Haws Run and Loco VFD. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
